In this theoretical lecture, we will discuss key concepts in data analysis 
The aim is to give you an overview of the different types of data analysis and 
which techniques can be used in which context. 
In addition, the basic vocabulary is clarified so that you don't get lost in 
the jungle of buzzwords that exists in the context of 'data science'.
